notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 21464a on UMI microfilm.

Reproductions of the originals in the University of Minnesota Library ("Early English books, 1475-1640" reel 1288), and the Union Theological Seminary, New York ("Early English books, 1641-1700" reel 2132).
